column5: Trade away the stresses of everyday life for total relaxation at this exceptional 3-bedroom, 3-bathroom vacation rental home in Glen Rose, Texas. With 2,100 square feet of masterfully appointed living space, this home is an ideal accommodation choice for a medium-sized family or group who is looking to experience the small town feel. Situated within close proximity to many attractions, you wonâ€™t have to venture far for fun!
column8: 3BR/3BA Home, Walking Dist. to Downtown Glen Rose
